title: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)
descriptions:
Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit! This powerful tool set comes with everything you need to tackle any task. With its compact and lightweight design, it's perfect for those who want a tool that is easy to handle and won't strain your arms.

The drill, model DCD771, features a speed transmission with low and high settings, allowing you to easily adjust the speed from 0 to 1500 RPM. With a power output of 300 UWO, this drill can handle even the toughest jobs. The 1/2-inch single sleeve ratcheting chuck ensures a secure grip on your bits, and the ergonomic handle provides comfort and control.

The impact driver, model DCF885, is just as impressive. It measures a compact 5.55 inches from front to back and weighs only 2.8 lbs, making it easy to maneuver in tight spaces. The 1/4-inch hex chuck allows for quick and easy bit loading, and it accepts 1-inch bit tips. The built-in LED light ring with 3 LEDs provides superior visibility, eliminating shadows and allowing you to work in any lighting condition. Plus, the light has a delay of 20 seconds, giving you ample time to see your work area.

This combo kit includes 2 batteries and a charger, so you'll never run out of power. The batteries are 20V Lithium Ion, ensuring long-lasting performance. The charger is included, so you can easily recharge your batteries whenever needed.

With its yellow and black color scheme, this tool set is both stylish and durable. And don't forget about the LED foot light, which provides superior visibility in any situation.

Whether you're a DIY enthusiast or a professional contractor, the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit is a must-have tool set. With its wide range of applications and high-quality features, it's sure to meet all your needs. Order yours today and experience the power and convenience of DEWALT!

With the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit, you can tackle a wide range of applications with ease. Whether you're drilling holes or driving screws, this kit has got you covered. The LED foot light enhances visibility, ensuring you never miss a spot.

In the package, you'll find everything you need: the DCD771 Drill/Driver, the DCF885 Impact Driver, 2 20V Lithium Ion Batteries, and a charger. Get your hands on this incredible combo kit today and experience the power and convenience of DEWALT!

This combo kit includes 2 batteries and a charger, so you'll never run out of power in the middle of a project. The batteries are long-lasting and the charger ensures quick and efficient charging. The kit comes in a stylish Yellow/Black color, so you can work in style.

With the additional feature of an LED foot light for superior visibility, this kit is perfect for elderly folks who may have trouble seeing in dimly lit areas. The DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit is designed to make your DIY projects easier and more enjoyable, no matter your age or experience level.

Order your DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit today and experience the power and versatility of these high-quality tools.
